params.targetSizeUSD: Target hedge size in USD (1e6), 0 to close

returns.pnlUSDC: Net P&L in USDC (1e6), negative = cost, positive = profit

accrueMarginFees().notice: Accrue margin fees for open hedge

adjustHedge(uint256).notice: Adjust hedge to target size (in USD, 1e6)

configureVault(address,address,address).notice: Configure adapter for a specific vault

getHedgeState(address).notice: Get current hedge state for a vault

getHedgeValue(address).notice: Get net hedge value (can be negative) in USDC (1e6)
